name: greenwood-games-deploy
description: Production deployment scripts for Greenwood Games

scripts.deploy:build: npm run build:all && npm run docker:build
scripts.deploy:restart: npm run deploy:stop && npm run deploy:start
scripts.build:all: npm run build:server && npm run build:web && npm run build:mobile
scripts.build:web: cd web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:mobile: cd mobile && npm install && npx expo export --platform web
scripts.security:scan: npm audit && docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/app aquasec/trivy filesystem /app
scripts.test:production: npm run test:load && npm run test:security
